original_title: Hiroo Onoda: Japanese World War 2 Holdout
overview: The story of Hiroo Onoda, a Japanese soldier who remained in the Philippines fighting for Japan's victory in a war they lost 19 years earlier..
tagline: The story of intense patriotic conviction, blind allegiance, fanatical delusion and dramatic irony.
title: Hiroo Onoda: Japanese World War 2 Holdout
